overview: From 2025-07-08 to 2025-07-09, elizaos-plugins/registry had 2 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added support for several new plugins, including Ankr, Gelato, Gitcoin Passport, Holdstation, Hyperbolic, Injective, Mina, Pyth Data, and Squid Router.

* **Chores**
  * Updated and reordered the list of available plugins for improved organization.

topPRs.title: Add plugin-mattermost to registry
topPRs.author: bealers
topPRs.body: # Add Mattermost Plugin to Registry ## Plugin Information - **Name**: plugin-mattermost - **Repository**: https://github.com/bealers/plugin-mattermost - **Package**: @elizaos-plugins/plugin-mattermost - **Category**: Client ## Description Mattermost client plugin for elizaOS enabling AI agent integration with Mattermost chat platforms. Screenshot attached and [youtube here](https://youtu.be/k4DLMsru2IQ). ## Features - Message handling in channels and DMs - Thread conversation support - File attachment support - Auto-channel joining - WebSocket real-time communication ## Demo Evidence - ✅ Plugin builds successfully - ✅ Tests pass - ✅ Proper elizaOS integration - ✅ Branding assets included - ✅ Documentation complete ## Registry Changes - Added `@elizaos-plugins/plugin-mattermost` pointing to `github:bealers/plugin-mattermost` - Positioned alphabetically in registry ## Installation ```json { "plugins": ["@elizaos-plugins/plugin-mattermost"] } ``` ## Checklist - [x] Plugin follows elizaOS architecture - [x] Includes required branding assets - [x] Documentation is complete - [x] Tests are passing - [x] Proper namespace used in registry ## Summary by CodeRabbit * **New Features** * Added support for the Mattermost plugin, enabling integration with the "@bealers/plugin-mattermost" from its GitHub repository.

topPRs.title: Add @esscrypt/plugin-polkadot to registry
topPRs.author: mikirov
topPRs.body:
# Registry Update Checklist

Registry:
- [x] I've made the left side of the colon of JSON entry in index.json match the potential NPM package name
- [x] I've used github not github.com
- [x] There is no .git extension
- [x] It's placed it alphabetically in the list
- [x] I've dealt with commas properly so the list is still valid JSON

If not an eliza-plugins official repo, i.e. new plugin: 

The plugin repo has:
- [x] is publically accessible (not a private repo)
- [x] uses main as it's default branch
- [x] I have include `elizaos-plugins` in the topics in the GitHub repo settings. If the plugin is related to `AI` or `crypto`, please add those as topics as well.
- [x] add simple description in github repo
- [x] follows this convention
```
plugin-name/
├── images/
│   ├── logo.jpg        # Plugin branding logo
│   ├── banner.jpg      # Plugin banner image
├── src/
│   ├── index.ts        # Main plugin entry point
│   ├── actions/        # Plugin-specific actions
│   ├── clients/        # Client implementations
│   ├── adapters/       # Adapter implementations
│   └── types.ts        # Type definitions
│   └── environment.ts  # runtime.getSetting, zod validation
├── package.json        # Plugin dependencies
└── README.md          # Plugin documentation
```
- [x] an `images/banner.jpg` and `images/logo.jpg` and they
  - Use clear, high-resolution images
  - Keep file sizes optimized (< 500KB for logos, < 1MB for banners)
  - Follow the [elizaOS Brand Guidelines](https://github.com/elizaOS/brandkit)
  - Include alt text for accessibility
- [x] package.json has a agentConfig like the following
```json
{
  "name": "@myNpmOrg/plugin-example",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "agentConfig": {
    "pluginType": "elizaos:plugin:1.0.0",
    "pluginParameters": {
      "COINMARKETCAP_API_KEY": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "The API key for the CoinMarketCap API"
      },
      "POLKADOT_RPC_URL": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "The URL of the Polkadot RPC endpoint"
      },
      "POLKADOT_PRIVATE_KEY": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "The private key for the Polkadot wallet"
      }
    }
  },
}
```

<!-- If you are on Discord, please join https://discord.gg/elizaOS and state your Discord username here for the contributor role and join us in #development-feed -->
<!--
## Discord username
- "shimonchick"
-->


<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added support for the "@esscrypt/plugin-polkadot" plugin, enabling new functionality through this integration.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: Add @bealers/plugin-mattermost to registry
topPRs.author: bealers
topPRs.body:
This PR adds @bealers/plugin-mattermost to the registry.

- Package name: @bealers/plugin-mattermost
- GitHub repository: github:bealers/plugin-mattermost
- Version: 0.1.6
- Description: Mattermost client plugin for ElizaOS - enables AI agent integration with Mattermost chat platforms

Submitted by: @bealers

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Added a new entry for "@bealers/plugin-mattermost" to the plugin index.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topContributors.summary: wtfsayo: Merged 23 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including several merging develop to main, and made significant code changes across 252 files (+5623/-2967 lines) with a focus on bug fixes, and approved 1 review and commented on 2 PRs.

tcm390: Merged 6 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including a large refactoring to replace `window.confirm` usages (+801/-564 lines) and several bug fixes, with a total of +1507/-846 lines across 55 files. Also has 2 PRs open in elizaos/eliza.

ChristopherTrimboli: Merged 3 PRs in elizaos/eliza, including "fix: commit lerna changes" (elizaos/eliza#5463) and "fix: bump versions in lerna before build" (elizaos/eliza#5461, +18/-9 lines), and modified 21 files with +665/-293 lines, focusing on other and bugfix work. Also submitted 2 reviews, including 1 approval and 1 change request.
0xbbjoker: Merged elizaos/eliza#5475, fixing SPA routing fallback and a nested button hydration error (+41/-28 lines), and provided 3 approvals on other PRs. The work was focused on bug fixes.
lalalune: Merged a substantial feature addition, elizaos/eliza#5436 "feat: add action chaining" (+19421/-4014 lines), and modified 25 files with a focus on feature work.

SYMBaiEX: Merged elizaos/eliza#5437, fixing Windows plugin loading and dev command failures (+161/-151 lines), and made code changes across 28 files with a focus on bug fixes (57%) and feature work (29%). The work involved 14 commits.

yungalgo: Merged elizaos/eliza#5454, which updated the create command helper text and warning message (+84/-127 lines), and is working on elizaos/eliza#5456 to allow agent name argument passing in start and agent commands; also commented on 2 PRs.
bowtiedbluefin: Opened elizaos/eliza#5464, a feature update to plugin install logic, modifying 1 file with +17/-3 lines of code. bowtiedbluefin shows a pattern of consistent daily work.
borisudovicic: Opened two issues in elizaos/eliza, specifically #5452 regarding a v1 to v2 character migrator and #5438 to set up a rate-limited Eliza hosted LLM and embedding endpoint.
github-advanced-security: Activity included one review with comments. Sporadic activity was observed today.
linear: Created two issues in elizaos/eliza: #5432 regarding server start crashes and #5447 about update command behavior. Both issues were closed.
